programme.title: Extreme Escapes
programme.desc: E2- In Budapest, David Merlini attempts a challenging escape that involves being fastened into a straitjacket while being frozen; an attempt at the jaws-of-death escape; the cup-and-spike street challenge grows to a larger-than-life level.

programme.title: Extreme Escapes
programme.desc: E3- Michael Griffin and a spear gun is set to fire at his heart; Jan Rouven faces off against a jet engine; Murray SawChuck is locked in a trunk of a car set to explode with no way to stop it!

programme.title: Extreme Escapes
programme.desc: E4- Michael Turco, fitted for cement shoes, is tossed to the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean; Spencer Horsman with an ancient torture device; Franz Harary and an advancing bulldozer ready to crush him.

programme.title: Extreme Escapes
programme.desc: E5- Brandy LaPlante insane car drop, Michael Turco drawn and quartered escape, Farrel Dillon aquatic nightmare, Franz Harary bound to railroad tracks in the face of a powerful locomotive.
